name: Caddie AI
headline: The future of website conversion
description: Caddie AI is building the future of website conversion. We're currently working in stealth with some incredible customers. Stay tuned!

founders.name: Alan Nowogrodski, Founder
founders.description:
Alan is the Founder and CEO of Caddie. He previously was a Head of Product for the payments and mobile business at FreshBooks. He started as a PM and built the unit from $0 to $30M+ in annual revenue in under 5 years. Alan later joined NinjaCat as a VP of Product Management and member of the executive team. He took additional responsibilities as VP of Marketing and VP of Engineering Operations. 

He started his career by building a web development company in the early 2000s while in high school.

generated_description:
**Caddie AI: Shaping the Future of Website Conversion**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from Toronto, Canada, Caddie AI is a fresh player in the ever-evolving landscape of website conversion. Currently in stealth mode—yes, you heard that right—they're not just building a product; they're laying the groundwork for something that promises to redefine how businesses engage with their online audiences.

Their mission is straightforward: they aim to enhance website conversion, helping businesses transform casual visitors into committed customers through intelligent design and functionality. While the specifics are still under wraps, they’re collaborating with “some incredible customers” to ensure their product meets real market needs.

Caddie AI is part of the prestigious Y Combinator Batch S22, which adds a layer of credibility and indicates they're taking the right steps to scale their venture. Despite being a lean team of just two employees, their ambitions are high, and they have the backing of Group Partner Nicolas Dessaigne—who knows a thing or two about scaling tech companies.

The company sits comfortably in the categories of SaaS, B2B, sales, marketing, and enterprise, with a focus that suggests not just building tools, but creating solutions that integrate seamlessly into the operations of some of the biggest players in the industry. 

So, what should you do? Keep an eye on Caddie AI. The promise of innovative solutions and groundbreaking approaches to website conversion is tantalizing, and it looks like the team is poised to deliver something that could significantly impact the digital marketplace. For more updates, you can check them out at their website: [trycaddie.com](http://www.trycaddie.com). Stay tuned; we might be witnessing the nascent stages of a real game-changer in the making!
